testcase.name: Basic Functionality Tests › should handle basic user interactions
Basic Functionality Tests › should have proper accessibility basics
Basic Functionality Tests › should handle keyboard navigation
Basic Functionality Tests › should load without console errors
Basic Functionality Tests › should have reasonable performance
Complete Ordering Flow › should complete full ordering flow from team setup to order completion
Complete Ordering Flow › should handle navigation between phases correctly
Complete Ordering Flow › should handle temporary member addition during ordering
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle network errors gracefully
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should validate team member input
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle deadline validation
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle empty order submission
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle Firebase connection errors
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle large team sizes
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle session timeout
Error Handling and Edge Cases › should handle browser refresh during ordering
